findings.rationale: The obligation to maintain confidentiality in perpetuity may pose a significant risk for the receiving party, as it creates an indefinite exposure to liability.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: The clause requiring indemnification without limit can expose a party to significant financial risk in the event of a breach.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit, arising out of any breach of this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The lack of limitation on liability can lead to unforeseen financial consequences, exposing either party to substantial losses.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The automatic assignment of all rights to Company A may limit the ability of the other party to utilize their own work product.
findings.evidence_quote: All work product and deliverables created hereunder shall be owned exclusively by Company A.

findings.rationale: The clause favoring the prevailing party for recovery of attorneys' fees may deter parties from pursuing valid claims due to potential high costs.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
